articles.description: Want to have your say on which icon Google Chrome uses on your Mac? Now's your chance.
articles.content: Google briefly released and then pulled a new Chrome update yesterday, designed to work natively on M1-powred Macs. But alongside that we also saw a new icon, specifically designed to look right at h… [+1262 chars]

articles.title: Sony a7C super compact camera launched for vloggers in India - India Today
articles.description: Sony India has launched its latest full-frame Sony a7C camera for Rs 1,67,990. The camera draws attention of digital content creators for being ultra compact.
articles.content: Almost two months later, Sony has launched its super compact Sony a7C full-frame camera in India. It was earlier announced on September 15 in North America, and now has made its way for Indian camera… [+2994 chars]
